title: Polki Star Tassel Haaram - A Celestial Delight
materials: Ruby Beads. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This unique Haaram showcases a star-shaped pendant adorned with meticulously set Polki diamonds. Below the star, a larger Polki is suspended, leading to a delightful tassel composed of ruby beads and freshwater pearls. The chain features a alternating ruby and pearl design that adds a touch of modern sophistication to traditional aesthetics. The piece is handcrafted by skilled artisans, reflecting exquisite attention to detail.
colors: Clear (Polki Diamonds). The combination of red and gold is considered auspicious in South Indian traditions.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions like weddings (Vivaaham)
or a sophisticated evening out. It can also complement a half-saree function or other traditional ceremonies.
description: A distinctive blend of traditional Polki craftsmanship with a contemporary design. The star motif is a modern twist on classic Indian jewelry. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds and natural pearls ensures lasting beauty and value. This statement piece is sure to turn heads and become a treasured heirloom.
